name: The Floor is Lava (itch) (ReyanshKumar)
description: This is a simple game in one and a half hour!! All assets are from Kenney and music is from chosic.com. The main aim of the game is to reach the door without hitting the lava. Play on easy and a five year old could do it, play it on hard and your precision is tested. So far there is only one level but I have plans to update it into a much more fun game with many levels.
